short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pause, skip, favorite, and read about each song on Hypem.com without ever having to find the tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Last updated: June 14th, 2014

This extension allows you to play, pause, skip, favorite, and read all about songs on Hype Machine (hypem.com) without needing to find the tab!  

You will need to refresh the Hype Machine if you have it open before using this extension.

Known Issues v2.3
- As always, report bugs/issues to me.  @dunphtastic or mark@dunphtastic.com

Change Log (v2.3)
- Update some graphics to look better on retina displays.
- Minor design changes
- Add hotkey support! Thanks to Chris Best (github.com/chr1sbest), you can now use the following hotkeys when you have the popup window open.
    - Pause/Play: Spacebar
    - Next: j (or right arrow)
    - Previous: k (or left arrow)
    - Favorite: f

Feel free to shoot me an email directly at mark@dunphtastic.com (or tweet @dunphtastic) if you have any trouble with the extension.  Also feel free to email me with any bug reports, feature requests, or just to say hi.  Thanks!
